hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported:The Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said: When any one of you leads people in prayer, he must shorten it for among them are the weak, the infirm and those who have business to attend

chapter.ara-name: باب أَمْرِ الأَئِمَّةِ بِتَخْفِيفِ الصَّلاَةِ فِي تَمَامٍ
chapter.eng-name: The Command To The Imam To Make The Prayer Brief But Complete
